00013 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultXAxis;
00014 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultYAxis;
00015 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultZAxis;
00016 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultTwistAxis;
00017 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultThrottleAxis;
00018 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultTriggerButton;
00019 const UINT32 Joystick::kDefaultTopButton;
00020 static Joystick *joysticks[DriverStation::kJoystickPorts];
00021 static bool joySticksInitialized = false;
00022 
00029 Joystick::Joystick(UINT32 port)
00030     : m_ds (NULL)
00031     , m_port (port)
00032     , m_axes (NULL)
00033     , m_buttons (NULL)
00034 {
00035     InitJoystick(kNumAxisTypes, kNumButtonTypes);
00036 
00037     m_axes[kXAxis] = kDefaultXAxis;
00038     m_axes[kYAxis] = kDefaultYAxis;
00039     m_axes[kZAxis] = kDefaultZAxis;
00040     m_axes[kTwistAxis] = kDefaultTwistAxis;
00041     m_axes[kThrottleAxis] = kDefaultThrottleAxis;
00042     
00043     m_buttons[kTriggerButton] = kDefaultTriggerButton;
00044     m_buttons[kTopButton] = kDefaultTopButton;
00045 }
00046 
00057 Joystick::Joystick(UINT32 port, UINT32 numAxisTypes, UINT32 numButtonTypes)
00058     : m_ds (NULL)
00059     , m_port (port)
00060     , m_axes (NULL)
00061     , m_buttons (NULL)
00062 {
00063     InitJoystick(numAxisTypes, numButtonTypes);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void Joystick::InitJoystick(UINT32 numAxisTypes, UINT32 numButtonTypes)
00067 {
00068     if ( !joySticksInitialized )
00069     {
00070         for (unsigned i = 0; i < DriverStation::kJoystickPorts; i++)
00071             joysticks[i] = NULL;
00072         joySticksInitialized = true;
00073     }
00074     joysticks[m_port - 1] = this;
00075     
00076     m_ds = DriverStation::GetInstance();
00077     m_axes = new UINT32[numAxisTypes];
00078     m_buttons = new UINT32[numButtonTypes];
00079 }
00080 
00081 Joystick * Joystick::GetStickForPort(UINT32 port)
00082 {
00083     Joystick *stick = joysticks[port - 1];
00084     if (stick == NULL)
00085     {
00086         stick = new Joystick(port);
00087         joysticks[port - 1] = stick;
00088     }
00089     return stick;
00090 }
00091 
00092 Joystick::~Joystick()
00093 {
00094     delete [] m_buttons;
00095     delete [] m_axes;
00096 }
00097 
00102 float Joystick::GetX(JoystickHand hand)
00103 {
00104     return GetRawAxis(m_axes[kXAxis]);
00105 }
00106 
00111 float Joystick::GetY(JoystickHand hand)
00112 {
00113     return GetRawAxis(m_axes[kYAxis]);
00114 }

00120 float Joystick::GetZ()
00121 {
00122     return GetRawAxis(m_axes[kZAxis]);
00123 }

00129 float Joystick::GetTwist()
00130 {
00131     return GetRawAxis(m_axes[kTwistAxis]);

00138 float Joystick::GetThrottle()
00139 {
00140     return GetRawAxis(m_axes[kThrottleAxis]);
00141 }
00142 
00149 float Joystick::GetRawAxis(UINT32 axis)
00150 {
00151     return m_ds->GetStickAxis(m_port, axis);
00152 }
00153 
00163 float Joystick::GetAxis(AxisType axis)
00164 {
00165     switch(axis)
00166     {
00167         case kXAxis: return this->GetX();
00168         case kYAxis: return this->GetY();
00169         case kZAxis: return this->GetZ();
00170         case kTwistAxis: return this->GetTwist();
00171         case kThrottleAxis: return this->GetThrottle();
00172         default:
00173             wpi_fatal(BadJoystickAxis);
00174             return 0.0;
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00186 bool Joystick::GetTrigger(JoystickHand hand)
00187 {
00188     return GetRawButton(m_buttons[kTriggerButton]);
00189 }
00190 
00199 bool Joystick::GetTop(JoystickHand hand)
00200 {
00201     return GetRawButton(m_buttons[kTopButton]);
00202 }
00203 
00208 bool Joystick::GetBumper(JoystickHand hand)
00209 {
00210     // Joysticks don't have bumpers.
00211     wpi_assert(false);
00212     return false;
00213 }
00214 
00224 bool Joystick::GetRawButton(UINT32 button)
00225 {
00226     return ((0x1 << (button-1)) & m_ds->GetStickButtons(m_port)) != 0;
00227 }
00228 
00237 bool Joystick::GetButton(ButtonType button)
00238 {
00239     switch (button)
00240     {
00241     case kTriggerButton: return GetTrigger();
00242     case kTopButton: return GetTop();
00243     default:
00244         wpi_assert(false);
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247 }

00255 UINT32 Joystick::GetAxisChannel(AxisType axis)
00256 {
00257     return m_axes[axis];
00258 }
00259 
00266 void Joystick::SetAxisChannel(AxisType axis, UINT32 channel)
00267 {
00268     m_axes[axis] = channel;
00269 }
00270 
00277 float Joystick::GetMagnitude(){
00278     return sqrt(pow(GetX(),2) + pow(GetY(),2) );
00279 }
00280 
00287 float Joystick::GetDirectionRadians(){
00288     return atan2(GetX(), -GetY());
00289 }
00290 
00300 float Joystick::GetDirectionDegrees(){
00301     return (180/acos(-1))*GetDirectionRadians();
00302 }
